English: donko shiitake mushroom, a prized type of shiitake (Lentinula edodes) cultivated in winter, with thick flesh and partially open cap

d.f: `泛指~`在~`冬季~`生產~、`採收~`的~`菇~`類~。`包括~`香菇~、`洋菇~、`草菇~`等~。

English: donko shiitake mushroom, a prized type of shiitake (Lentinula edodes) cultivated in winter, with thick flesh and partially open cap
